subcategory.name: Order History Pages
subcategory.description: Ecommerce order history page examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS order history page examples to enable customers to view a record of their past purchases, access details of each order, and track the status of active deliveries. These page examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
